messages.content: What is ComfyUI-Q-Align and where is it implemented from?
ComfyUI-Q-Align is an unofficial implementation of Q-Align for ComfyUI, which is taken from the original Q-Align project available on GitHub.
What hardware requirements are needed to run ComfyUI-Q-Align?
To run ComfyUI-Q-Align, you need a VRAM greater than 16GB.
Is ComfyUI-Q-Align an official feature of ComfyUI?
No, ComfyUI-Q-Align is an unofficial implementation, meaning it is not an official feature of ComfyUI.
